data.title: 2015_Dolinar_Evaluation of CMIP5 simulated clouds and TOA radiation budgets using NASA.pdf
data.note:
Contents

  • Abstract
  • Introduction
  • Data and methodology
    • Global climate models (GCMs)
    • Satellite observations
      • CERES--MODIS (CM) SYN1 deg Ed2.6: daytime only
      • ISCCP-D2
      • Combined CloudSat/CALIPSO--CERES MODIS (CCCM) data product
      • CERES EBAF Ed2.7
  • Results and discussion
    • Global (65degN to 65degS) and zonal characteristics
    • Biases in dynamically driven vertical velocity regimes over the oceans between 45degN to 45degS
  • Sensitivities of CRFs to CF and CWP
  • General score of simulated clouds and TOA CRFs
  • Error analysis: where are these errors coming from?
  • Conclusions
  • Acknowledgments
  • References
